definition: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs, core, and improves focus.
instructions: Stand with feet together. Shift your weight onto your left foot. Place your right foot on your inner left thigh or calf. Bring your hands together at your chest or stretch them overhead.

definition: A standing pose that stretches the legs, hips, and spine while opening the chest.
instructions: Stand with feet wide apart. Turn your right foot out 90 degrees, left foot slightly in. Extend your arms parallel to the floor. Reach your right hand towards your right shin or the floor, extending your left arm upwards.

definition: A gentle flow between two poses that warms up the spine and relieves tension.
instructions: Start on hands and knees in a tabletop position. Inhale, arch your back (Cow Pose), lifting your head and tailbone. Exhale, round your spine (Cat Pose), tucking your chin and tailbone.

definition: A backbend that strengthens the spine and opens the chest.
instructions: Lie face down with palms under shoulders. Press into your hands, lifting your chest off the ground. Keep elbows close to your body and shoulders relaxed. Gaze slightly upward.

pose: Half Lord of the Fishes Pose (Ardha Matsyendrasana)
definition: A seated twist that stretches the spine and shoulders while improving digestion.
instructions: Sit with legs extended. Bend your right knee and place your right foot outside your left thigh. Twist your torso to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee. Place your right hand on the floor behind you.

definition: A core-strengthening pose that also engages the hip flexors and spine.
instructions: Sit with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lean back slightly, lifting your feet off the ground. Extend your arms forward, parallel to the floor. Straighten your legs, forming a V shape with your body.

definition: A forward bend that stretches the spine, hamstrings, and calves.
instructions: Sit with legs extended straight. Inhale, lengthen your spine. Exhale, fold forward, reaching for your feet or shins. Keep your back straight and neck relaxed.

definition: A backbend that stretches the front of the body and strengthens the back.
instructions: Kneel on the floor with knees hip-width apart. Place your hands on your lower back or reach for your heels. Press your hips forward, lifting your chest and arching your back. Gaze upwards.

definition: A hip opener that stretches the outer hips and thighs.
instructions: Sit with your legs extended. Bend your right knee, stacking your right shin on top of your left. Flex both feet. Fold forward, resting your forearms on the floor.

definition: A forearm balance that strengthens the arms, shoulders, and core while stretching the hamstrings.
instructions: Start on hands and knees. Lower your forearms to the floor, shoulder-width apart. Lift your hips towards the ceiling, straightening your legs. Keep your head between your arms, gaze slightly forward.

definition: A deep squat that opens the hips and stretches the lower back.
instructions: Stand with feet slightly wider than hip-width apart. Bend your knees, lowering your hips into a squat. Bring your hands together at your chest, pressing your elbows into your inner thighs. Keep your spine straight and chest lifted.

definition: A prone backbend that strengthens the back, glutes, and legs.
instructions: Lie face down with arms by your sides. Lift your chest, arms, and legs off the ground. Keep your neck in line with your spine. Hold and breathe deeply.

definition: A balancing pose that strengthens the arms, core, and legs.
instructions: Start in a plank position. Shift your weight onto your right hand and outer edge of your right foot. Stack your left foot on top of your right. Lift your left arm towards the ceiling, keeping your body in a straight line.

definition: A backbend that opens the chest and stretches the neck and throat.
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift your chest, placing the crown of your head on the floor. Keep your hands under your hips or arms extended by your sides. Breathe deeply and relax.

definition: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs and core while improving focus.
instructions: Stand with feet together. Shift your weight onto your right foot. Extend your right hand towards the floor, lifting your left leg parallel to the ground. Reach your left arm towards the ceiling, keeping your gaze forward.

definition: A standing pose that stretches the legs, hips, and sides of the body while strengthening the legs.
instructions: Stand with feet wide apart. Turn your right foot out 90 degrees, left foot slightly in. Bend your right knee, placing your right hand on the floor or a block outside your right foot. Extend your left arm over your ear, reaching towards the ceiling.

definition: A standing pose that strengthens the thighs, glutes, and core.
instructions: Stand with feet together. Bend your knees, lowering your hips as if sitting in a chair. Extend your arms overhead, keeping your chest lifted. Hold and breathe deeply.

definition: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs and improves focus.
instructions: Stand with feet together. Lift your right leg and cross it over your left thigh, wrapping your right foot around your left calf. Cross your right arm under your left arm, bringing palms together. Hold and breathe deeply.

definition: A gentle stretch that opens the hips and stretches the inner thighs and lower back.
instructions: Lie on your back, bringing your knees towards your chest. Hold the outside edges of your feet with your hands. Gently press your knees towards the floor, keeping your feet flexed. Breathe deeply and relax.

definition: A backbend that strengthens the back, glutes, and legs while opening the chest.
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet hip-width apart. Press your feet into the mat, lifting your hips towards the ceiling. Clasp your hands under your back, rolling your shoulders under. Keep your thighs and feet parallel.

definition: A backbend that opens the chest and strengthens the spine, arms, and wrists.
instructions: Lie face down with palms under shoulders. Press into your hands, lifting your chest and legs off the ground. Keep your thighs and tops of your feet pressing into the mat. Gaze slightly upward.

definition: A deep backbend and hip opener that stretches the front of the body and thighs.
instructions: Begin in a tabletop position. Bring your right knee towards your right wrist. Extend your left leg straight behind you. Lift your chest, reaching your arms back and grabbing your left foot.

definition: A seated pose that stretches the shoulders, arms, and hips.
instructions: Sit with legs extended. Bend your right knee, placing your right foot outside your left hip. Cross your left leg over your right, placing your left foot outside your right hip. Reach your right arm behind your back and your left arm overhead, clasping your hands.

definition: A seated pose that opens the hips and stretches the inner thighs.
instructions: Sit with legs extended. Bend your knees, bringing the soles of your feet together. Hold your feet with your hands, gently pressing your knees towards the floor. Keep your spine straight and chest lifted.

definition: A gentle backbend and stretch for the spine and shoulders.
instructions: Start on hands and knees. Walk your hands forward, lowering your chest towards the floor. Keep your hips above your knees. Rest your forehead on the mat and breathe deeply.

definition: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and arms while stretching the hips and chest.
instructions: Stand with feet wide apart. Turn your right foot out 90 degrees, left foot slightly in. Bend your right knee, aligning it over your right ankle. Extend your arms overhead, keeping your hips square to the front.

definition: A standing twist that stretches the legs, hips, and spine while improving balance.
instructions: Stand with feet wide apart. Turn your right foot out 90 degrees, left foot slightly in. Extend your arms parallel to the floor. Twist your torso to the right, placing your left hand on the floor or a block outside your right foot.

definition: A forward bend that stretches the hamstrings and calves while calming the mind.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge at your hips, folding forward and reaching for your feet or the floor. Keep your knees slightly bent if needed. Let your head and neck relax.

definition: A lunge that stretches the hips and strengthens the legs while improving balance.
instructions: Start in a standing position. Step your right foot forward, bending your right knee to 90 degrees. Extend your left leg straight behind you, keeping your left heel lifted. Extend your arms overhead and gaze forward.

pose: Reclining Bound Angle Pose (Supta Baddha Konasana)
definition: A reclined pose that opens the hips and stretches the inner thighs.
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent. Bring the soles of your feet together, letting your knees fall open. Place your arms by your sides or overhead. Breathe deeply and relax.

definition: A twist in chair pose that strengthens the legs and core while stretching the spine.
instructions: Stand with feet together. Bend your knees, lowering your hips as if sitting in a chair. Bring your hands together at your chest. Twist your torso to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee.

definition: A strengthening pose that engages the core, arms, and shoulders.
instructions: Start in a push-up position with your hands under your shoulders. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Engage your core and hold.

definition: A seated pose that stretches the thighs and ankles while promoting relaxation.
instructions: Kneel on the floor with knees together and feet slightly apart. Sit back on your heels or between your feet. Rest your hands on your thighs and breathe deeply.

definition: An arm balance that strengthens the core, shoulders, and arms while enhancing concentration and balance.
instructions: Squat down, placing your hands on the mat shoulder-width apart. Lift your hips, bringing your knees to rest on the backs of your upper arms. Shift your weight forward, balancing on your hands. Keep your gaze forward and engage your core.

definition: A restful pose that stretches the hips, thighs, and ankles while reducing stress and fatigue.
instructions: Kneel on the floor, sitting back on your heels. Bend forward, bringing your forehead to the mat. Stretch your arms forward or alongside your body. Breathe deeply and relax.
